name: d3-history
author: Vijith Assar
description: control the HTML5 History API using JavaScript events and d3-dispatch

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -g d3-dispatch:d3,d3-history:d3 -f umd -n d3 -o build/d3-history.js -- index.js && npm run lint
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-history.js -c -m -o build/d3-history.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-history.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-history.js build/d3-history.min.js
